banner.title: Welcome to Vancouver Odia Cultural Association
banner.subtitle: Celebrating Odia Culture in Vancouver

about.title: About VOCA
about.content: The Vancouver Odia Cultural Association (VOCA) is a not-for-profit social and cultural organization dedicated to preserving and promoting the rich cultural heritage of Odisha among the Odia community in Vancouver. Founded with the vision of building a strong and united Odia community, VOCA serves as a platform to connect people from Odisha and celebrate our traditions, language, and culture.

event1.title: Raja Celebration
event1.description: Join us for a celebration of the traditional Odia festival of Raja with music, dance, and authentic Odia cuisine.

event2.title: Rath Yatra Festival
event2.description: Experience the grand celebration of Rath Yatra, featuring a chariot procession, cultural performances, and community gathering.

event3.title: Cultural Workshop
event3.description: Learn about Odisha's rich cultural heritage, including traditional arts, crafts, and language in this interactive workshop.

member1.name: Priya Patel
member1.bio: A passionate advocate for Odia culture with over 10 years of community organizing experience.

member2.name: Raj Mohanty
member2.bio: Committed to fostering connections between the Odia diaspora and promoting cultural exchange.

member3.name: Leena Das
member3.bio: An accomplished Odissi dancer dedicated to preserving traditional Odia arts.
